original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṁ antaraghare gacchanti kāyaṁ olambentā …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kāyappacālakam antaraghare gacchanti kāyam olambentā pe
na kāyappacālakam antaraghare gamissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca kāyappacālakaṁ antaraghare gacchati kāyaṁ olambento, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca kāyappacālakam antaraghare gacchati kāyam olambentaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa
